Title: Adds to the definition of serious injury and relates to determining the sufficiency of the evidence related to the serious injury
Summary: Adds to the definition of serious injury and relates to determining the sufficiency of the evidence related to the serious injury; includes that question of fact will be determined by the trier.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the definition of serious injury and determining the sufficiency of the evidence with respect thereto
